title: Sergey Petrovich Kovalchuk
text: Sergey Petrovich Kovalchuk (; born 16 December 1973) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. Since 2005, he has worked for <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Brest">Dinamo Brest</a> in various coaching positions.
